content:
SerializationMode Enum

Definition

Determines the serialization method used for a ProfilePropertySettings object.

In this Article

public enum SerializationMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
SerializationMode

Remarks

The SerializeAs property of the ProfilePropertySettings object controls the serialization mode for a single profile property setting.

Fields

Binary

The ProfilePropertySettings object is serialized using binary serialization.
ProviderSpecific

The provider has implicit knowledge of the type and is responsible for deciding how to serialize the ProfilePropertySettings object into the data store.
String

The ProfilePropertySettings object is serialized to a simple string.
Xml

The profile ProfilePropertySettings is serialized as XML using XML serialization.
